```{=html}
<script>
function makeCardsClickable() {
  document.querySelectorAll('.notepad-section .quarto-post').forEach(function(card) {
    if (card.dataset.clickHandler) return;
    card.dataset.clickHandler = 'true';
    
    var link = card.querySelector('h3.listing-title a, .listing-title a');
    if (!link) return;
    
    card.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      // Don't navigate if clicking directly on a link or category button
      if (e.target.closest('a') || e.target.closest('.listing-category')) return;
      window.location.href = link.href;
    });
  });
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  makeCardsClickable();
  setTimeout(makeCardsClickable, 500);
});
</script>
```
